Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

::Magmatron::

    Magmatron finished the device he had been working on sin=
ce he had gotten to the beast wars. It was a transdimensional gateway. The =
only signatures that could go through were Destron signatures.
    Magmatro=
n took direct control over the Queen, his ultimate creation. She called her=
 minions back to the Sulaco. Then she walked through the gateway, dissappea=
ring into the dimension of Magmatron's choice.
    He hit a few more button=
s and set the Sulaco to destroy any opening in the mountain. This was nobod=
y would get in to find his research, and since only a few people would know=
 of the Sulaco he wouldn't worry. He then sent a comm to Zardus.
    "Allia=
nce Commander Zardus," He started. "I am dropping out of this war. I am sen=
ding a download of all my finding on this planet, and how to use them to yo=
ur advantage, I wish you luck, and when I return I hope to find that you ha=
ve the utmost advantage. Good-Bye."
    The transmission ended with the sen=
ding of the downloaded information. It contained all the information regard=
ing the Xenomorph DNA, how to graft it onto an existing warrior. And it was=
 sent triple encoded, tight beam sucrity line, directly to the Iron Fist's =
command room.
    The Destrons were all now returning to the Sulaco. Dachan=
de had stayed behind, he still had business to take care of. Now that they =
were all onboard they all walked through the gateway. Jynx, Praetorian, Cer=
berus, Obitus, Fame, Bellum, AEger. They all went to the new dimension.
   =
 "Destrons, if you want to stay on earth, well, then you need to leave the =
Sulaco within the next 20 minutes, or else you will be stuck," Magmatron br=
oadcast to all Destron units, in the feild or at base. 
    Then he turned =
and faced the Gateway. He started to step through, then remembered somethin=
g. He grabbed his data tracks that had everything they knew about Prime and=
 the Autobots. Then he stepped through. The Gateway shut down behind him, o=
nly able to be activated by his hand. He saw his new home, it was a great p=
lace, huge, with many new worlds to conqure. He would be happy here.
